Type.Name: Antialias
Type.summary: Specifies the type of antialiasing to do when rendering text or shapes.

Type.Name: CairoAPI
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: Color
Type.summary: Color objects holding red, green, blue, and alpha values.

Type.Name: Content
Type.summary: Used to describe the content that a surface will contain, whether color information, alpha information (translucence vs. opacity), or both.

Type.Name: Context
Type.summary: This is the main object when drawing with Cairo.

Type.Name: DirectFBSurface
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: Distance
Type.summary: Defines a distance between two points.

Type.Name: Extend
Type.summary: Defines Pattern Extend types.

Type.Name: FillRule
Type.summary: Defines a FillRule.

Type.Name: Filter
Type.summary: Defines Filter types on Graphics and Pattern objects.

Type.Name: FontExtents
Type.summary: Stores metric information for a font. Values are given in the current user-space coordinate system.

Type.Name: FontFace
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: FontOptions
Type.summary: How a font should be rendered

Type.Name: FontSlant
Type.summary: Defines the possible slants on fonts.

Type.Name: FontType
Type.summary: Describes the type of a given font face or scaled font.

Type.Name: FontWeight
Type.summary: Defines the wieght of the font (normal, bold).

Type.Name: Format
Type.summary: Used to identify the memory format of image data.

Type.Name: GlitzSurface
Type.summary: Glitz OpenGL surface support.

Type.Name: Glyph
Type.summary: This structure holds information about a single glyph when drawing or measuring text.

Type.Name: Gradient
Type.summary: Base class for gradients.

Type.Name: Graphics
Type.summary: Obsolete version of Cairo.Context, use it instead.

Type.Name: HintMetrics
Type.summary: Specifies whether to hint font metrics.

Type.Name: HintStyle
Type.summary: Specifies the type of hinting to do on font outlines.

Type.Name: ImageSurface
Type.summary: An in-memory image surface.

Type.Name: LinearGradient
Type.summary: Extends by providing a linear gradient along the line defined by (x0, y0) and (x1, y1).

Type.Name: LineCap
Type.summary: Defines the various line ending styles.

Type.Name: LineJoin
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: Matrix
Type.summary: Defines the Matrix object for transformations and translations.

Type.Name: NativeMethods
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: Operator
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: Path
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: Pattern
Type.summary: Patterns allow you to tile or extend images and objects and allow you to draw things like gradients.

Type.Name: PatternType
Type.summary: Describes the type of a given pattern.

Type.Name: PdfSurface
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: Point
Type.summary: Class defining a point represented by two int values.

Type.Name: PointD
Type.summary: Class defining a point represented by two double values for the x and y coordinates.

Type.Name: PSSurface
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: RadialGradient
Type.summary: Extends to create a new radial gradient between the two circles defined by (cx0, cxy0, radius0) and (cx1, cy1, radius1).

Type.Name: Rectangle
Type.summary: A representation of a Rectangle.

Type.Name: ScaledFont
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: SolidPattern
Type.summary: Extends Pattern to create a solid pattern consisting of a solid color and an optional alpha value.

Type.Name: Status
Type.summary: Reports the internal status of the Cairo system. When an error occurs, all further calls to acquire the status will report the error.

Type.Name: SubpixelOrder
Type.summary: The subpixel order specifies the order of color elements within each pixel on the display device when rendering with an antialiasing mode of Cairo.Antialias.Subpixel.

Type.Name: Surface
Type.summary: Base class for surfaces.

Type.Name: SurfacePattern
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: SurfaceType
Type.summary: Describes the type of a given surface.

Type.Name: SvgSurface
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: SvgVersion
Type.summary: Describes the version number of the SVG specification that a generated SVG file will conform to.

Type.Name: TextExtents
Type.summary: Stores the extents of a single glyph or a string of glyphs in user-space coordinates.

Type.Name: Win32Surface
Type.summary: Microsoft Windows surface support.

Type.Name: XcbSurface
Type.summary: To be added.

Type.Name: XlibSurface
Type.summary: X Window System rendering using XLib.
